title: Ragama resident arrested with ICE from Walpola
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A 43-year-old resident from Ragama was arrested with 23g and 100 mg of a drug called ICE on Thursday (6) by the Special Task Force (STF) at Batuwatta Road, Walpola.
The STF seized Rs.14,000/- earned from selling drugs, and a mobile phone from the suspect’s possession.
